title: A Question About The New Honor System.
body:
http://i.imgur.com/lVuRaN5.jpg
Hi Riot and Fellow Sumoners. I was just wondering if it was possible to rank back up in the new honor system. I've been getting multiple honor also x3 honor and x4 honors. I'm a reformed player that never uses chat only for information. I deserve what I deserve. I just wanted to know if I could ever get a fly lvl 3 thingie. Thanks for your time {{champion:201}}

replies.body: Since you're at Rank 0 currently, you'll need to work your way back up through Ranks 1-2 before you'll reach 3. But with enough games played and honors gained you'll still be able to get there with enough time.
